name: Navy Grog

ingredients.item: Gold demerara rum, such as El Dorado
Dark Jamaican rum, such as Appleton Estate
White Cuban or Puerto Rican rum, such Bacardí Superior
Honey syrup (equal parts honey and water)

preparation:
Add all the ingredients into a shaker filled with crushed ice and shake until well-chilled (about 30 seconds).
Strain into a chilled rocks glass with fresh crushed ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig.
